body:
> Circle's failure relates to security issues with some packages required through a photon-ant dependency. I will have to resolve that within the photon-ant package itself, however this PR is still good for review.

Once we have Yarn set up, it may be possible to pin the version of the dependency in this project, instead of updating it in photon-ant. It is probably worth-while to update in both places though.
body_text:
Circle's failure relates to security issues with some packages required through a photon-ant dependency. I will have to resolve that within the photon-ant package itself, however this PR is still good for review.

Once we have Yarn set up, it may be possible to pin the version of the dependency in this project, instead of updating it in photon-ant. It is probably worth-while to update in both places though.
body_html:
Circle's failure relates to security issues with some packages required through a photon-ant dependency. I will have to resolve that within the photon-ant package itself, however this PR is still good for review.

Once we have Yarn set up, it may be possible to pin the version of the dependency in this project, instead of updating it in photon-ant. It is probably worth-while to update in both places though.
